name: ItItWhatIt.Is
overview:
Empowers consumers to make better, quicker purchase decisions.

ItIsWhatIt.Is cuts through sales and marketing hype to help consumers get to understand what a product they are thinking of buying is really like. Rather than comparing biased information from sales people and companies who are trying to sell them the product ItIsWhatIt.Is are a totally transparent about everything so you can be assure you are getting unbiased advise.

They make money by helping you make purchase decisions and giving you the option to support our site by buying through a link which pays them commission. You don’t pay any more by buying through the link the retailer pays them commission. They will even tell you which links make them money and how much they make. This is to earn trust so you know they are not recommending the products which make them the most money.You don’t have to buy through their links but if you do it supports them to carry on being a free, independent, trust worthy place to get advice on what to buy.

Their two goals are:

-To put the customers interests before their own -To earn consumers trust through transparency
